returns._0: The amount of ether balance claimed

params.gasSecondsToConsume: The amount of gas seconds to consume
params.gasToClaim: The amount of gas to claim
params.recipientOfGas: The address of the recipient of the gas

returns._0: The amount of gas claimed (gasToClaim - penalty)

params.recipientOfGas: The address of the recipient of the gas

params.minClaimRateBips: The minimum claim rate in basis points
params.recipientOfGas: The address of the recipient of the gas
The address of the recipient of the gas

params._patexConfigurationContract: The address of the Patex configuration contract.
params._patexFeeVault: The address of the Patex fee vault.

params.gasSecondsToConsume: The amount of gas seconds to consume
params.gasToClaim: The amount of gas to claim

returns._0: claimRate The calculated claim rate in basis points
returns._1: gasSecondsToConsume The normalized gas seconds to consume (<= gasSecondsToConsume)

returns.etherBalance: The total ether balance for the user
returns.etherSeconds: The integral of ether over time (ether * seconds vested)
returns.lastUpdated: The last updated timestamp for the user's gas parameters
returns.mode: The current gas mode for the user

params.mode: The new gas mode for the contract

returns._0: Semver contract version as a string.

adminClaimGas(address).notice: Allows the admin to claim the gas of any address

claim(address,address,uint256,uint256).notice: Allows a contract to claim a specified amount of gas, at a claim rate set by the number of gas seconds

claimAll(address,address).notice: Allows a contract to claim all gas

claimGasAtMinClaimRate(address,address,u.notice: Allows a user to claim gas at a minimum claim rate (error = 1 bip)

claimMax(address,address).notice: Allows a contract to claim all gas at the highest possible claim rate

getClaimRateBps(uint256,uint256).notice: Calculates the claim rate in basis points based on gasSeconds, gasToClaim

readGasParams(address).notice: Reads the gas parameters for a given user

setGasMode(address,uint8).notice: Allows an authorized user to set the gas mode for a contract via the PatexConfigurationContract

updateAdminParameters(uint256,uint256,ui.notice: Allows the admin to update the parameters

version().notice: Returns the full semver contract version.
